title: Strangest Things
overview: Using new research and 3D technology, this UK production explores some of the most perplexing and unusual artefacts from ancient and modern history. Objects are pulled apart, with even the smallest details examined, and lost or damaged artefacts are rebuilt to uncover their secrets. Strangest ThingsÂ reveals the unbelievable, the ancient, and the truly bizarre currently hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world.
